subtitle: This dish can be served warm or cold.

method.text: Slice beans in half, if they are too long. Rinse and drain.
Heat the oil in a pan. Saute the onions and garlic until pale golden. Add the beans and potatoes. Saute until golden.
Stir in the tomatoes. Season to taste. Cover and cook for 20-30 min until beans are tender, stirring occasionally. If the tomato sauce begins to stick to the pan, add a little water.
Remove from the heat. Stir in the feta cheese, olives, coriander and more seasoning, if required. Leave to cool to room temperature before serving.

title: Green bean, potato and feta medley
